name.ch: 基因體遺傳分析與應用

goal.ch: The genome-wide association study is powerful in elucidating the genetic variants of various traits, ranging from human disease to desired features in horticulture and aquaculture. This course offers its principle and step-wise analyses. The students will become familiar with the software and tools for the GWAS through carrying out a research project. The students will learn the data interpretation and the limitations of GWAS.
goal.en: The genome-wide association study is powerful in elucidating the genetic variants of various traits, ranging from human disease to desired features in horticulture and aquaculture. This course offers its principle and step-wise analyses. The students will become familiar with the software and tools for the GWAS through carrying out a research project. The students will learn the data interpretation and the limitations of GWAS.

outline.ch:
1. Introduction
2. Mendelian and Non-Mendelian Genetics
3. Inheritance of Complex Traits
4. Principle of Genome-Wide Association Study and Statistics
5. Experimental Design of Genome-Wide Association Study
6. Genotyping and Genomic Variation
7. Correcting for Hidden Population Structure in Single Marker Association Testing and Estimation
8. Project proposal
9. Haplotype Imputation for Association Analysis
10. SNP Imputation for Association Studies
11. Design of Large-Scale Genetic Association Studies, Sample Size, and Power
12. Post-GWAS Analyses
13. Polygenic Score Analysis
14. Case Study: Autoimmune disease
15. Case Study: Systemic Lupus Erythematosus
16. Practice and Problem Solving II
17. Practice and Problem Solving II
18. Discussion and Report due

textbook.ch:
•Tsunoda, T., Tanaka, T., Nakamura, Y. Genome-Wide Association Studies. Springer eBooks. ISBN : 9789811381775 (2019)
•Stram, D. O. Design, Analysis, and Interpretation of Genome-Wide Association Scans. Springer eBooks. ISBN : 9781461494430 (2014)
•Kim, J. H. Genome Data Analysis. Springer eBooks. ISBN : 9789811319426 (2019) 
•Selected reviews and original research articles
